statements: DELETE FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' AND consent_given = TRUE;
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE consent_given = FALSE AND research_topic = 'AI';
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE data_analyzed = TRUE AND research_study_name = 'Study A';
DELETE FROM study_participants WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30 AND consent_given = true;
DELETE FROM StudyData WHERE study_id = 'a89b123e-4567-12d3-4567-426614174000' AND participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM data_collection WHERE participant_id = 100 AND study_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
